original_text: And Adah bare Jabal: he was the father of such as dwell in tents, and of such as have cattle.
korean_text: 아다는 야발을 낳았으니 그는 장막에 거주하며 가축을 치는 자의 조상이 되었고

sentences.original_text: he was the father of such as dwell in tents,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 장막에 거하는 자들의 아버지가 되었으며

sentences.original_text: and of such as have cattle.
